title: Email research documents to Dave as Word files
description:
Convert the two research documents to Word (.docx) format and email them to Dave at dhurley@servos.io:
1. .claude/state/research/godaddy-m365-api-access.md
2. .claude/state/research/subagent-best-practices.md

actions.note: Installed pandoc, converted both markdown files to .docx, added attachment support to jmap.js, emailed both docs to dhurley@servos.io with 2 attachments.
